Name: PORN Handyman VR
About the game: Become a HANDYMAN and go through an adventure known only from adult movies. You start in your garage, expect a call from the customer. Suddenly you get a phone call a woman who has a job to do. Pack your tools into the toolbox and go. You have to repair the computer and replace the fuses. If you do the job, the woman will be very grateful for the work you have done. She is so happy that she wants to offer you something more than money ... Special tip ... You can choose one of four locations in the house where you will have sex with the girl.
